Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package openssh for versions less than 8.9p1-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package openssh for versions less than 8.9p1-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssh is earlier than 8.9p1-4, affected by CVE-2023-48795
